RadarInfoLong: (Modifieurs):\nEn tant que Sondeur, vous avez une flèche pointant vers la personne la plus proche tout le temps.
DiseasedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When someone tries to use the Kill button on you, their Cooldown will be increased by a configurable amount of time.
AntidoteInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When someone tries to use the Kill button on you, their Cooldown will be decreased by a configurable amount of time.
StubbornInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
With the Stubborn Add-on, Eraser can't erase your role, Cleanser can't cleanse you, Bandit can't steal from you, and Monarch can't knight you.
Additionally, you can't gain any new Add-ons from the Merchant.
SwiftInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Swift, you will not make any movement when you kill.
Note: Swift also ignores Bait
UnluckyInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As Unlucky, when you Complete Tasks, Kill, Venting, or open a Door, you have a chance to die.
SpurtInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When you start walking, you gain an enormous speed boost, which swiftly deteriorates, until you have to rest still for a while to rejuvenate your speed.
VoidBallotInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Holder of this Add-on will have 0 vote count.
AwareInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Aware, you get a notification in the next meeting if a revealing role had interacted with you.
FragileInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As Fragile, you will instantly die if someone tries to use the Kill button on you (even if the role cannot directly kill).
GhoulInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Ghoul, one of two outcomes can occur on task completion.

If alive: Suicide
If dead: You kill your killer if they're alive.

This is only assigned to Crewmates, and not Crewmates with no tasks or are task-based.
BloodthirstInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Bloodthirst, doing tasks allows you to become bloodthirsty and kill players.
When you finish a task, the next player you come in contact with dies.

Your Bloodthirst remains after a meeting.
Upon making a kill, your Bloodthirst clears till the next task you complete.
Bloodthirsts do not stack.

Only assigned to Crewmates with tasks.
MareInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Mare, you have a low Kill Cooldown and have higher speed but can only kill during lights.

Additionally, your name will appear in red during lights.

Only assigned to Impostors and cannot be guessed.
BurstInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Burst, your killer explodes if they aren't inside a Vent after a set amount of time.
SleuthInfoLong:
(Modifieurs):
Le Limier obtient des informations à partir des Cadavres.

Optionnellement, il peut également obtenir le Rôle de l'Exécuteur.

Il n'est pas assigné au Détective ou Croque-Mort.
ClumsyInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Clumsy, you have a chance to miss your kill.

When you miss, your Cooldown is reset, and the target remains untouched.

Only assigned to killers.
CircumventInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Circumvent, you can't Vent.

Only assigned to Impostors.
NimbleInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Nimble, you gain access to the Vent button.

Only assigned to certain Crewmates.
InfluencedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Influenced, your vote will be forced to the player with the most votes.
Influenced vote won't be counted while choosing the exiled player'
Note that your vote skill still functions on the player you voted first
If all the alive players are Influenced, then the vote result won't shift
Collector cannot become Influenced.
SilentInfoLong:
(Modifieurs):

Le Muet n'a pas son Icône de Vote qui apparaît lors du résultat.
Personne ne sait qui il Vote.
SusceptibleInfoLong:
(Modifieurs):
Le Susceptible aura une Cause de Mort Aléatoire.
TrickyInfoLong:
(Modifieurs):
Le Futé a des Causes de Mort Aléatoires pour ses Exécutions.
TiredInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Whenever Tired kills (or uses kill ability on) someone, alternatively whenever they finish a task, they will temporarily get lower vision & lower speed.
StatueInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Whenever many people are near the Statue, the Statue is completely frozen or slowed down depending on the settings.
EvaderInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When the Evader gets voted out, there is a chance they will not get ejected. (Chance set by the Host.)
CyberInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Cyber, you cannot die while in a group.
Depending on the settings, Impostors, Neutrals, and or Crewmates will know if you die.
HurriedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the hurried, you must finish all your tasks to win with your team! If you fail with your tasks, you lose.
Hurried hurries to his goal, so it won't get Madmate, Charmed or so.
OiiaiInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the OIIAI, when you die, you will make your killer forget their role.
Additionally, you may pass OIIAI on to the killer, depending on settings.
RainbowInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Rainbow, you change your colors like crazy.
GMInfoLong: (n'appartient pas à une équipe):\nLe maître du jeu est un rôle pour observer.\n Sa présence n'affecte pas le jeu, tous les joueurs sait qui est le maître du jeu. Le Maître du jeu ne peut être assigné qu'à l'hôte qui deviendra un fantôme au début de la partie.
SunnyboyInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Sunnyboy, you win if you are dead by the end of the game. The game will not end when you are alive due to killers gaining the majority.
Additionally, you have access to portable Vitals.
BardInfoLong:
(Impostors):
When a Bard is alive, the exile confirmation will display a sentence composed by the Bard. Whenever the Bard completes a creation, the Bard's Kill Cooldown will be permanently halved.
WardenInfoLong:
(Coéquipiers [Fantôme]):
L'Aviseur Alerte quelqu'un d'un Danger proche, de plus il peut temporairement Augmenter leur Vitesse.
GhastlyInfoLong:
(Crewmates [Ghost]):
As the Ghastly, possess an unsuspecting person, after that choose a target for them, now they'll only be able to use their kill (or kill ability) on target until you possess someone else or possess time runs out.
MinionInfoLong:
(Impostor [Ghost]):
As the Minion, you can temporarily blind non-Impostors.
DollMasterInfoLong:
(Impostor):
As the Dollmaster, you can temporarily take control of any player by using the <color=#ff0000>Shapeshift</color> button and to make them do your deeds!
DoubleAgentInfoLong:
(Impostor):
As the Double Agent, you cannot access the Kill button. However, you can vote for someone in a meeting to pass a bomb onto them, which can only be done one player at a time. Once the meeting has finished, the bomb will activate and explode in a set amount of time.
Note: when you pass the bomb onto someone in a meeting, you can vote afterward.

Additionally depending on settings the Double Agent can diffuse <color=#696969>Bastion</color> and <color=#F4A460>Agitator</color> bombs when Venting.

The Double Agent can change roles when they are the <color=#ff1919>Last Impostor</color>, depending on the settings the role can be a <color=#ee43c3>Admired Impostor</color>, <color=#ff1919>Trickster</color>, <color=#BA2E05>Traitor</color>, or stay as the Double Agent.
SlothInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
The Sloth's default movement speed is slower than others.
(Speed depends on the setting of the Host)
ProhibitedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Prohibited, you have specific Vents that you can't use.
How many Vents are disabled depends on the Host's settings.
EavesdropperInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Eavesdropper, you have a chance to read other Role/Add-on information-based messages like Mortician or Sleuth.
ApocalypseInfoLong:
(Apocalypse):
Apocalypse members are on a separate team that works together and wins together. If there are multiple Apocalypse roles in the game, they can see each other's roles.
Depending on the Host's settings, Apocalypse roles can guess or be guessed.
RevenantInfoLong:
(Neutral):
As the Revenant, your goal is to be killed. If you are killed, you will take your killer's role and kill your killer instead. You cannot win before being killed.
Note that Revenant only works when being directly killed.

SuffixModeText.NoAndroidPlz: Pas de téléphone, s'il te plaît
DisableEmojiName: Désactiver les Émojis dans les Noms

PreventSeeRolesImmediatelyAfterDeath: Prevent seeing other's roles immediately after death
GhostCanSeeDeathReason: Ghost can see Cause Of Death
GhostIgnoreTasks: Les Fantômes sont exemptés de Tâches

NeutralCanBeGhostRole: Neutral Players can be Any Ghost-Roles (Will change team respectively)

VoteNotUseAbility: You chose not to use your ability, and now may choose to skip or vote someone.

PlayerCanSetName: Les Joueurs peuvent utiliser la Commande /rn
PlayerCanUseQuitCommand: Les Joueurs peuvent utiliser la Commande /quit pour Quitter le Salon pour toujours
PlayerCanUseTP: Les Joueurs peuvent utiliser la Commande /tpin et /tpout

EnableCustomDecorations: Activer les décorations de cartes personnalisées
ForceOwnLanguage: Forcer le mod à utiliser votre Langue si possible
ForceOwnLanguageRoleName: Forcer les noms de Rôles dans votre Langue si possible
VersionCheat: Contourner la vérification de la synchronisation des versions
ExileSpamMsg: Regarde-moi ça, on a un intello qui essaye de tricher en parlant pendant une Éjection !

KickLowLevelPlayer: Exclure les Joueurs dont le Niveau est Inférieur à
TempBanLowLevelPlayer: Bannissement temporaire des Joueurs de bas Niveau
ApplyWhiteList: Activer la Liste Blanche pour contourner l'Exclusion par le niveau
AllowOnlyWhiteList: Autorise uniquement les joueurs sur la Liste Blanche à rejoindre
AutoKickStartAsBan: Bloquer un joueur après qu'il a été Exclu
AutoKickStopWords: Exclure les joueurs qui écrivent des mots interdits
AutoKickStopWordsTimes: Nombre d'avertissements pour les mots interdits
AutoKickStopWordsAsBan: Bloquer un joueur après son Exclusion
AutoWarnStopWords: Avertissement à ceux qui écrivent des mots interdits
TempBanPlayersWhoKeepQuitting: Bannir temporairement les Joueurs qui déco-réco constamment
QuitTimesTillTempBan: Nombre de décos-récos nécessaires pour un Bannissement temporaire
ShareLobby: Allow TOHE-Chan Shares Lobby Code to Discord
ShareLobbyMinPlayer: Share Lobby Code When the Number of Players Reaches
WhenNonVote: Si le joueur n'a pas Voté
DisableAirshipCockpitAdmin: Désactiver la Table d'Administration de la Cabine de Pilotage
DisableAirshipRecordsAdmin: Désactiver la Table d'Administration des Enregistrements
DisableFungleVital: Désactiver le Moniteur des Signes Vitaux
DisableFungleBinoculars: Désactiver les Jumelles (Ne marche pas en Version Classique)
LightsOutSpecialSettings: Réglages Spéciaux de Réparation les Lumières
BlockDisturbancesToSwitches: Bloquer les Interrupteurs lorsqu'ils sont en position haute
DisableAirshipViewingDeckLightsPanel: Désactiver le Panneau des Lumières du Pont (<color=#ed0007>Airship</color>)
DisableAirshipGapRoomLightsPanel: Désactiver le Panneau des Lumières dans Plateforme (<color=#ed0007>Airship</color>)
DisableAirshipCargoLightsPanel: Désactiver le Panneau des Lumières dans le Cargo (<color=#ed0007>Airship</color>)
CommsCamouflage: Camouflage pendant le Sabotage des Communications
DisableOnSomeMaps: Disable Comms Camouflage on some maps
DisableReportWhenCC: Désactiver le Signalement du Cadavre lors du Camouflage
ChangeNameToRoleInfo: Montrer les informations sur les Rôles aux Clients Non-Modifiés lors de la première Réunion
SendRoleDescriptionFirstMeeting: Montrer la Description des Rôles aux Clients Non-Modifiés lors de la première Réunion
DisableZiplineFromTop: Désactiver l'utilisation de la Tyrolienne par le dessus
DisableZiplineFromUnder: Désactiver l'utilisation de la Tyrolienne par le dessous
ResetDoorsEveryTurns:
Réinitialisation des Portes après la Réunion
(<color=#ed0007>Airship</color>/<color=#a167c0>Polus</color>/<color=#ffa646>Fungle</color>)

DecontaminationTimeOnMiraHQ: Durée de la Décontamination sur <color=#e84b56>MIRA HQ</color>
RandomBirthdayAndHalloweenDecorationSkel: Set Random Decoration When Birthday And Halloween Is Active On <color=#66a186>The Skeld</color>
ApplyDenyNameList: Appliquer la liste des Noms Interdits
KickPlayerFriendCodeInvalid: Kick players with an invalid Friend Code
TempBanPlayerFriendCodeInvalid: Temp Ban players with an invalid Friend Code
RemovePetsAtDeadPlayers: Retirer les Familiers aux Joueurs Morts
ShowNKRemainOnEject: À l'Éjection afficher les <color=#7f8c8d>Neutres Exécuteurs</color> restants
HideBittenRolesOnEject: Cacher les Rôles des joueurs <color=#7b8968>Mordus<color> lors de l'Éjection
ShowTeamNextToRoleNameOnEject: Afficher l'Équipe du Rôle du joueur Éjecté
OnlyCancel: Annuler uniquement les actions de Triche
ShieldPersonDiedFirst: Protéger joueur Mort en premier à la partie précédente
ShieldedCanUseKillButton: Shielded player can use ability/Kill button
PlayerIsShieldedByGame: Player is protected by the game!
ArsonistMinPlayersToIgnite: Nombre minimal d'Aspergés nécessaires pour Incendier
ArsonistMaxPlayersToIgnite: Nombre maximal d'Aspergés nécessaires pour Incendier
PuppeteerDoubleKills: La Marionnette Meurt en même temps que la victime
DollMasterCanKillAsMainBody: Peut tuer en tant sans posséder
DollMasterTargetDiesAfterPossession: La cible meurt après la possession
DoubleAgentCanDiffuseBombs: Double Agent can diffuse bombs from other roles
DoubleAgentClearBombOnMeetingCall: Diffuse active bomb on meeting call

⚠ - This player is a Snitch or Solsticer who has finished their tasks.
★ - Used by Super Star or Cyber or Marshall.
† - This player was spelled and will die if the Witch is not killed by the end of the Meeting.
∇ - Used by Kamikaze to mark their targets.
■ - Used by Lightning to mark their Quantum Ghosts.
⊠ - Used by Jailer to mark their prisoner.
● - Used by Baker to mark who has Bread.
♠ - Used by Soul Collector to mark who's death they're predicting.
⦿ - Used by Plaguebearer to mark who they have plagued.
♣ - Shown on the Coven member with the Necronomicon. This is only shown to Coven.
⌘ - This player is Jinxed. This is only shown to Coven.
ø - This player is Illusioned. This is only shown to Coven.
♻ - This player is Stoned. This is only shown to Coven.
✂ - This player is a Voodoo Doll. This is only shown to Coven.

Message.GhostRoleInfo: Ghost Role Info Hiya! A little about ghost roles... Ghost roles drastically impact the game, so it's not recommended for smaller lobbies if you're unfamiliar. If not explicitly stated otherwise in the description, the Guard button is their ability button ;) Spawning: Ghost-roles only spawn after death; the first x people from (team) to die get them. PS: If your previous role didn't have tasks(e.g., sheriff), your tasks as a ghost-role aren't needed for task-win
Message.ApocalypseInfo:
Every role of the <#ff174f>Apocalypse</color> Team has their own objective to carry out in order to transform.
<#2B0804>Transformed</color> <#ff174f>Apocalypse</color> members have a drastic change on the game and are immortal (except for being voted), but everyone will be notified that they have transformed.

Roles: <#e5f6b4>Plaguebearer</color>, <#A675A1>Soul Collector</color>, <#bf9f7a>Baker</color>, <#cc0044>Berserker</color>
Transformed: <#343136>Pestilence</color>, <#644661>Death</color>, <#83461c>Famine</color>, <#2B0804>War</color>

Apocalypse members can see eachother's roles and ability icons.
Like Neutral Killers, Apocalypse members keep the game going as well, have fun!
Message.CovenInfo: The <#ac42f2>Coven is a faction of evildoers who specialize in Witchcraft. Their goal is to kill all who would oppose the <#ac42f2>Coven. They use the Necronomicon to enhance their powers, but only one member at a time can hold it. Most Coven roles can only kill if they hold the Necronomicon. A random Coven member will spawn with the Necronomicon, denoted by the <#ac42f2>♣ symbol next to their name. If the Necronomicon holder dies, the Necronomicon will be randomly given to another <#ac42f2>Coven member that is alive. During a meeting, Coven players can vote each other to determine who will gain the Necronomicon the following round. If the votes end in a tie or nobody votes, the Necronomicon holder will be the same. Votes will be returned and you will be allowed to vote normally.

QuizmasterInfo: Questionne les personnes pour les Exécuter pendant les Réunions
QuizmasterInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Quizmaster, you can mark a player using your Kill button. In the next meeting, the marked player will have "?!" next to their name. The player will die if they answer the question wrong or doesn't answer. The player will live if the Quizmaster is killed/ejected in the same meeting.
The Quizmaster cannot mark multiple people in the same round
QuizmasterChat.MarkedBy: Tu as été Marqué par le Questionneur Pour survivre tu dois Répondre correctement à cette Question :
QuizmasterChat.MarkedPublic: {QMTARGET} a été Marqué par le Questionneur Pour survivre {QMTARGET} doit Répondre correctement à sa Question !
QuizmasterChat.Answers: Réponse A: {QMA} B: {QMB} C: {QMC} Pour Répondre fais la Commande /answer [lettre de la Réponse] Si tu as besoin de revérifié la Réponse et la Question fais /qmquiz
QuizmasterChat.Correct: {QMTARGET} a la bonne Réponse ! Tu peux maintenant Marqué quelqu'un d'autre !
QuizmasterChat.CorrectPublic: {QMTARGET} a Répondu correctement à la Question du Questionneuret a Survécu ! Méfie-toi du Questionneur !
QuizmasterChat.WrongTarget: Faux Tu as Répondu {QMWRONG} La Bonne Réponse était {QMRIGHT} Le Questionneur était {QM}
QuizmasterChat.Wrong: {QMTARGET} a la mauvaise Réponse et est Mort ! Tu peux maintenant Marquer quelqu'un d'autre !
QuizmasterChat.WrongPublic: {QMTARGET} a Mal Répondu à la Question du Questionneuret est Mort ! Méfie-toi du Questionneur !
